p: LD mapping has several benefits and can be considered as a complementary approach to QTL mapping. First, it may allow faster progress than QTL analyses as it does not always involve making experimental populations. Second and most importantly, LD can provide higher mapping resolution as it takes into the account the accumulation of historic recombination events (Korte & Farlow, 2013; Xu, Li, Yang, & Xu, 2017).
